entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
